content: --धरः, --भृत् {%<ab>m.</ab>%} (धनुर्धरः &c.) {1} an archer; <ls>R. 2. 11</ls>, <ls n="R. 2.">29</ls>; <ls n="R.">3. 31</ls>, <ls n="R. 3.">38</ls>, <ls n="R. 3.">39</ls>; <ls n="R.">9. 11</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 97</ls>; <ls n="R.">16. 77.</ls> {2} an epithet of Viṣṇu. {3} the sign Sagittarius of the zodiac.
